properties.areaDesc: Blair, PA; Huntingdon, PA; Centre, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 9:28AM EST until January 8 at 10:15AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Northwestern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania...
Southern Centre County in central Pennsylvania...
Northeastern Blair County in central Pennsylvania...

* Until 1015 AM EST.

* At 928 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located over Warriors
Mark, moving southeast at 35 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts up to 35 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions.

* This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 55 to 58.

This snow squall will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern
Huntingdon, southern Centre and northeastern Blair Counties.
properties.instruction:
Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes
your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra
time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead
to accidents.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 10:15 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
